Reviews.Title: Blu Dash 4.0 is the one of  the best cheap Android Phones
Reviews.Author: Serge Mushigo
Reviews.Content: Good quality!  this is the one of  the best cheap Android Phones in this price range!This Budget Smart phone offers everything I need

Reviews.Title: Small and gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Ellie Tross
Reviews.Content: It's a decent sized phone that fits comfortably in my hand. Living abroad, it's a great option as it has dual sim card slots. Camera is pretty good and it has a flash on the back that can be a flashlight with the right app. It's a little slow sometimes but overall it's a good phone for the price

Reviews.Title: Worth the bucks
Reviews.Author: Andres Ortiz
Reviews.Content: It's what you paid for, no more, no less! It's very cool and feels sturdy! Has a skin and a screen protector so I'm cool
